actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to commemorate the 100th anniversary of the inauguration of ocean shipping service between the West Coast and Hawaii by Captain William Matson and to commend the Matson Navigation Company for a century of service and leadership, during both war and peace, in the West and Pacific trade.

summary.text: Extends the congratulations of the Senate to Matson Navigation Company on its centennial year and appreciation for dedicated service between the west coast and Hawaii.

titles.title: A resolution to commemorate the 100th anniversary of the inauguration of ocean shipping service between the West Coast and Hawaii by Captain William Matson and to commend the Matson Navigation Company for a century of service and leadership, during both war and peace, in the West and Pacific trade.
